99-0560 (La. 4/23/99)

Louis R. KOERNER, Jr. v. The CITY OF NEW ORLEANS. No. 99-C-0560. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 23, 1999.

IN RE: Koerner, Louis R. Jr.; — Plaintiffs); Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review; Parish of Orleans Orleans Parish Civil District Court Div. “H” Number 97-15968; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, Number 98CA-0916

Denied.

VICTORY, J. not on panel.
